channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole with sharp edge (destroyed 2 of my tyres), 19th February
item.description:
The pothole is in the middle of the road, the sharp edge is very dangerous with any car speed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 18 marle hill rd, 19th February
item.description:
Very uneven paving slabs causing very deep water/ puddles outside my front door, plus a trip hazard, been like this since we moved here in October 2025
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Marle Hill Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 19th February
item.description:
Customer was in this area around lunchtime and his racer bike wheels has gone into the drain gap and this trapped and diverted his wheel and he lost control. They fell off and hit a van with his shoulder. They would like to raise this concern as this a busy cycle route and thinner tyres may get jammed and lead loss of control and injury.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain is consistently blocked, even when reports have been closed., 19th February
item.description:
Blocked drain and flooding in alleyway by Wagamama and The Bank House Clarence Street / Church Street Junction. Standing water, blocked drain and rats. Hazard to public.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Street, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
